item.title: Hosting Android Dependencies on GitHub
item.description: As I mentioned in my last post, I’m developing an SDK at work. The libraries I use most frequently in my apps are all included as Maven dependencies. Adding a line to my build.gradle file is much preferred to downloading a JAR file. To make the SDK as easy as possible for developers to include in their projects, I wanted to deliver it the same way. Maven Central is the de facto repository for open source library hosting.
